column1: *me as a future grandpa, tucking grandson to bed* - grandson: how did you survive coronavirus, gramps? - me: doin what i always do. stayin away from people. not because i was told to. i just merely fucken hate people. - grandson: *whispers* fucking legend -
Two astronauts escaped Earth today. Lucky bastards! #GeorgeFloyd #riots2020 #coronavirus #SpaceX
